title: Websocket extension: cannot connect to a web socket
body:
### Describe the bug

I followed the guide described on [https://quarkus.io/guides/websockets](url), upon starting the server (with only this extension installed) I tried to connect to a web socket, but got:  **Error: connect ECONNREFUSED ::1:8080**

The server uses default settings and it's hosted on localhost:8080. 




### Expected behavior

I should be able to connect to a web socket

### Actual behavior

Not able to connect to a web socket. 

### How to Reproduce?

1. Generate new app on [https://code.quarkus.io/](url) with only WebSockets extension. 
2. Build and start application. 
3. Try to connect to a web socket (I used Postman to test the connection and sent CONNECT as message upon sending connect request)

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

Java 21
